sources.title: The Deported | FULL MOVIE | 2009 | Comedy
sources.description:
When crooked INS agents deport an Italian-American actor (Nicholas Turturro) to Mexico, only his worrisome mom (Taire Shire) and a pack of orphans can help get him across the border and back to Holly

Directed by Lance Kawas
Starring: Nicholas Turturro, Talia Shire, Michael Rapport, Paul Rodriguez, Gary Valentine, Taylor Negron, Michael Badalucco, Kathrine Narducci, Felipe Esparza
2009

metadata.Plot: A U.S. Italian actor is deported to Mexico by crooked I.N.S. agents, and a pack of orphans help him find his way back to America.
metadata.Writer: James Mercel, Christian Sesma, Nicholas Turturro
metadata.Actors: Nicholas Turturro, Talia Shire, Gary Valentine
